channel.title: What am I doing now? on Germans Savcisens - Academic Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in What am I doing now? on Germans Savcisens - Academic Portfolio

item.title: What am I doing now?
item.description: Last on updated on 25th February 2024, while visiting my parents in Liepaja, Latvia. Closing work stuff As of Jan'24, I am a Research Assistant @ DTU (Social Complexity Lab). I am working on some follow up stuff to the life2vec paper, that includes a simpler implementation of the workflow: carlomarxdk/life2vec-light. Working with the Library Transaction dataset (book embeddings?)… Things to come As of May'24, I am starting as a Postroctoral Associate Researcher in RADLAB (Network Science Institute, Northeastern University).
